name: Hoshigami: Ruining Blue Earth
description: Hoshigami: Ruining Blue Earth (Hoshigami ～沈みゆく蒼き大地～, Hoshigami: Shizumiyuku Aoki Daichi) is a tactical role-playing game (RPG) developed by MaxFive and published by Atlus in 2001. The game was never released in Europe or Australia. The game was remade as Hoshigami Remix for the Nintendo DS in 2007 by Arc System Works.
